text:
Hi guys, I have quite an odd bug. When I visit the page <https://www.caseware.nl/trainingen/consolideren> in an incognito or normal tab, the menu is all messed up. This is only happening on specific pages. Somehow, the mobile menu is rendered inside the desktop header. When I add the bust cache param to the URL, the page looks fine (<https://www.caseware.nl/trainingen/consolideren?hsCacheBuster=5608>). When we edit the page, it looks fine inside the editor as well. Updating the global menu or the page makes no difference. There seems to be a cached version of this page that is messing things up.
Do you guys have an idea how I can resolve this?

Hi everybody, I work with custom objects and have them associated with each other and with contacts and companies. The strange thing now is that with companies I can do workflow triggers like “at least one associated custom object has property a with value b”. Unfortunately the same logic does not work with custom objects that are associated to a contact. Does anybody have a solution to this problem?
Hello Everybody, I'm looking for a HS developer who can work with us and build products for marketplace. Please DM me
i’d cross post this to the <#CBNDYJJAZ|jobs> channel as well for exposure.

Hello - We added new app to tracks inventory for products within HubSpot.  Syncs with Shopify, BigCommerce and adds inventory data within in HubSpot.  It also integrates nicely with HS workflows and Reports and Deals. Use case - a company that has b2c operation with Shopify or BigCommerce but also has a sales team that uses HubSpot to create deals within HubSpot and needs instant inventory numbers.  When Deals are closed/won it adjusts the inventory and syncs back to your ecommerce store. Tracks the inventory at different stages of your deals. <https://app.HubSpot.com/ecosystem/6221463/marketplace/apps/marketing/ecommerce/inventory-panda-283231>

Hi there!

Can't see HubSpot sprocket icon on live site - Trying to edit a website template and the sprocket is not showing.  Has anyone experienced this and know of a solution to get it to show, by chance?
Ad Block can sometimes hide it
Thanks <@UATE4ATHP> - Unfortunately, this didn't fix the issue.
Sounds kind of silly but make sure you’re signed in and have access to the portal

No, that's a good tip for sure.  It's strange, I am logged into the account, have access to the portal and a coworker went to the same website page and is also using Chrome.  She is able to see the Sprocket on the Top RHS and choose from the options, but nothing on my end.

I looked online and at previous posts here and tried enabling ads and pop ups but still no luck.
<@U2H3TT8F2> - do you happen to know of this issue?

Hi all,
I am trying to build dynamic pages from hubDB, i have an index page and dynamic pages are generated well,. the issue i have is, some of the products needs to be listings for the products so i need to have another sub level for that page. example: index page is all cars where i list all the cars, then the dynamic pages, some of them have a direct products but some of them are another list with car models, and then we have the particular car-model page.  something like cars/ , cars/toyota , cars/toyota-model(this is a dynamic page but it needs to be a listing page as well) and then we have another dynamic page for the particular car. basically i need to have multiple levels of templates. is this possible to achieve ???
